item.title: Bluetooth Prototypes: Wireless Devices Finally Talk
item.description: The Bluetooth Promise By August 2002, Bluetooth had been standardized for a few years, but actual working implementations were still rare. The promise was revolutionary: wirelessly connect your phone to headsets, computers, other devicesâ€”all without wires, all at close range. At Motorola, we saw Bluetooth as the future. Instead of wired connections or limited infrared, devices could communicate wirelessly over a distance of 10 meters. You could leave your headset at your desk and walk around the office with your phone.
